user_sentiment: Mildly dissatisfied - user sees progress but identifies additional refinements needed
execution_quality: Good technical execution with multiple iterative adjustments, but initial changes didn't fully address the user's evolving requirements around icon sizing and visual consistency across component variants.
work_category: UI refinement iteration for spacing/sizing in a React component, adjusting icon and line height proportions to create more compact layout options.
summary: The agent successfully made multiple spacing adjustments but missed key aspects of the user's intent: the icon could be sized more aggressively for compactness, and visual alignment wasn't verified across different component variants (category/location vs item nodes). The follow-up message indicates the user saw some progress but needs more targeted refinements to fully realize the compact design direction they envisioned.
follow_up_pattern: User provides specific technical feedback about icon sizing and cross-component visual consistency mismatches, expecting agent to make targeted corrections rather than broad changes.
